title: Bandhan Financial Services appoints Chandra Shekhar Ghosh as chairman cum executive director
description: Chandra Shekhar Ghosh is now the chairman and full-time executive director of Bandhan Financial Services. The decision was approved by shareholders including IFC and Sidbi. Ghosh took on this role after retiring from Bandhan Bank as managing director. Having founded the Bandhan group 24 years ago, Ghosh aims to contribute strategically to the group's growth.
